project_descr: Mainstreaming Sustainable Land and Forest Management in Dry Mountain Landscapes of Northeastern Armenia

outputs.output_descr: Sustainable land and forest management in the Northeastern Armenia secures continued flow of multiple ecosystem services (water provision, land slide control and carbon storage and sequestration) and ensures conservation of critical wildlife habitats.
